pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:3.13: According to [](Sp.1.463) this means the tenth dawn after one received the bowl: _Cīvaruppādadivasaena saddhiṃ ekādase aruṇuggamane nissaggiyaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ_, “It is to be understood in this way: it is to be relinquished on the eleventh dawn including the day when the robe (or bowl) was given.”
